oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - AFRS #155
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt from Grand Ole Opry Armed Forces Radio Service show #155. Featuring Red Foley (host/performer), Rod Brasfield (performer), Ernest Tubb (performer), Jordanaires (performers), Minnie Pearl (performer), and Stringbean (performer) on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red Foley; Rod Brasfield; Ernest Tubb; Jordanaires; Red Foley; Minnie Pearl; Stringbean
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- John Henry (Red Foley) -- Red Foley talks and introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield) -- Red Foley talks and introduces Ernest Tubb -- Ernest Tubb talks and introduces the next tune -- I Need Attention Bad (Ernest Tubb) -- Roll On Jordan (Jordanaires) -- I'll Fly Away (Red Foley) -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Pretty Polly (Stringbean) -- Red Foley talks about his record sales -- Lovebug Itch (Ernest Tubb, Red Foley, Minnie Pearl) -- Stand By Me (Red Foley) -- [Unidentified square dance tune] -- Closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (Radio program); WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Brasfield, Rod, 1910-1958; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Jordanaires (Musical group); Cannon, Sarah Ophelia, 1912-1996; Minnie Pearl; Stringbean, 1915-1973;
